description: An ancient Greek city founded in eastern Libya ca. 630 B.C., Cyrene later became part of the Roman empire (ca. 74 B.C.). The site was added to the UNESCO World Heritage List in 1982.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Ain Shahat, Grennah
